contentrichtext.text: [[File:China Hotel 1.jpg|thumb|China Hotel]] '''China Hotel, A Marriott Hotel''' ([[Simplified Chinese character|Simplified]]: 中国大酒店; [[Traditional Chinese character|Traditional]]: 中國大酒店) is a 5-star [[Marriott Hotels & Resorts|Marriott]] Hotel in [[Guangzhou]], [[Guangdong]], [[China]]. ==Ownership== Guangzhou Lingnan International Enterprise Group Co. Ltd ==Management== [[Marriott International|Marriott]] International, Inc. ==History== China Hotel was built in 1979 by the [[Hong Kong]] listed conglomerate [[Hopewell Holdings Ltd]] (controlled by Sir [[Gordon Wu]]) under a novel contractual agreement that came to be known as [[Build-Operate-Transfer]], a means of building and operating [[joint venture]]s with local authorities in China. This arrangement allowed a foreign partner to build a facility at its own expense, operated it for an agreed length of time to generate a return on its investment, then hand it over to a local partner at no cost. China Hotel first opened on the 18th of June 1984 and became the first hotel managed by [[Marriott International|Marriott]] in [[Mainland China]] in 1998. '''''China Hotel''''' became '''''China Hotel, A Marriott Hotel'''''. In 2008, the hotel was '''fully renovated''' and offers 850 Guest rooms. ==Hotel Facilities== China Hotel, A Marriott Hotel, offers: * '''850''' Guest rooms (including 300 Suites and Studios) * '''8''' Restaurants and Bars * '''16''' Meeting rooms, including a large '''Ballroom''' (25,058 sq.ft of total meeting space) * Health Club with '''Gym''', outdoor '''Swimming Pool''', '''Jacuzzi''', '''Sauna''' and '''Steam room''' * '''151''' Apartments ==Shopping & Sightseeing nearby the Hotel== * Shopping and entertainment: China Hotel, Marriott Hotel offers a large '''Shopping Arcade''' with fashion and beauty shops, including international banking, fine gifts and a trendy coffee shop. Nearby the Hotel: Beijing Road Pedestrian Shopping Street - Huanshi Middle Road (Commercial and Shopping District) - Pearl River Night Cruise * Parks and museums: Yue Xiu Park/Guangzhou History Museum - Liu Hua Lake Park - Lanpu Orchid Garden - Museum of the Western Han Dynasty Mausoleum of the Nanyue King - Sun Yat-sen Memorial Hall - Chen Clan Academy ==Access== * Airports: [[Guangzhou Baiyun International Airport]]: 35 km/21.7 miles * Train Station: [[Guangzhou East Railway Station]]: 11 km/5.6 miles (to Hong Kong and Shenzhen) * Subway station near the Hotel: Line 2, Yuexiu Park, Exit D1 * Bus station near the Hotel: Express Coach to/from Hong Kong Victoria Habour, Hong Kong International Airport and Macau ==External links== * [http://www.marriott.com/hotels/travel/canmc-china-hotel-a-marriott-hotel-guangzhou/ China Hotel, A Marriott Hotel's official website] * [http://www.marriott.com Marriott's official site] {{coord|23|8|32.54|N|113|15|19.20|E|display=title|region:CN_type:landmark}} [[Category:Hotels in Guangzhou]] [[Category:Hopewell Holdings]] [[Category:New World Development]] [[Category:Henderson Land Development]] [[Category:Sun Hung Kai Properties]] [[Category:Cheung Kong Holdings]] [[Category:Yuexiu District]] {{Asia-hotel-struct-stub}} {{PRC-struct-stub}}
